name: Daryabadi
text: Alif. Lam. Mim.

name: Daryabadi
text: Bethink men that they shall be left alone because they say: we believe; and that they shall not be tempted?

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We have tempted those who were before them. So Allah will surely know those who are true and He will surely know the liars.

name: Daryabadi
text: Or bethink those who work ill deeds that they shall outstrip Us? lll do they judge!

name: Daryabadi
text: Whosoever hopeth for the meeting with Allah, then Allah's term is surely coming, and He is the Hearer, the Knower.

name: Daryabadi
text: And whosoever strive, striveth only for himself: verily Allah is Independent of the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: And whosoever believe and work righteous works, We shall purge away from them their ill-deeds and shall recompense them the best of that which they have been working.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We have enjoined on man kindness unto parents. But if the twain strive to make thee associate with Me that of which thou hast no knowledge, obey them not. Unto Me is your return, and I shall declare unto you that which ye have been working.

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who believe and work righteous works--We shall surely cause them enter among the righteous.

name: Daryabadi
text: Of mankind are some who say: we believe in Allah; then if they are afflicted in the way of Allah, they take the persecution of men even as the torment of Allah; and then, if succour cometh from thy Lord they say: verily we have been with you. Is not Allah the Best Knower of that which is in the breasts of the creatures?

name: Daryabadi
text: And surely Allah shall come to know those who believe, and surely He shall come to know the hypocrites.

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who disbelieve say unto those who believe: follow our way, and we shall surely bear your sins; whereas they shall not bear aught of their sins; verily they are the liars.

name: Daryabadi
text: And surely they shall bear their loads and other loads beside their own loads, and surely they shall be questioned on the Day of Resurrection concerning that which they were wont to fabricate.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We sent Nuh unto his people. Then he tarried among them for a thousand years, save tifty years; and then deluge overtook them, while they were wrong-doers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We delivered him and those in the ark, and made it a sign unto the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We sent Ibrahim. Recall what time he said unto his people: worship Allah, and fear Him; that is best for you if ye but knew.

name: Daryabadi
text: Ye only worship images instead of Allah, and ye create a falsehood. Verily those whom ye worship instead of Allah own no provision for you. Wherefore seek with Allah provision, and worship Him, and give thanks unto Him: unto Him ye shall be returned.

name: Daryabadi
text: And if ye belie me, then communities before you have belied: and upon the apostle is naught but a preaching manifest.

name: Daryabadi
text: Observe they not what wise Allah originateth creation? And then He shall restore it. Verily for Allah that is easy.

name: Daryabadi
text: Say thou: go about in the land and behold what wise He hath originated creation; and then Allah shall produce another production; verily Allah is over everything Potent.

name: Daryabadi
text: He shall torment whomsoever He Will, and shall show mercy unto whomsoever He Will, and unto Him ye shall be returned.

name: Daryabadi
text: And ye cannot escape in the earth nor in the heaven, and beside Allah there is for you no friend nor helper.

name: Daryabadi
text: Those who disbelieve in the signs of Allah and in their meeting with Him, they shall despair of My mercy, and they! theirs shall be a torment afflictive.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then the answer of his people was naught but that they said: slay him, or burn him. Then Allah delivered him from the fire; verily herein are signs for a people who believe.

name: Daryabadi
text: And he said: ye have taken images instead of Allah out of affection between you in the life of the world; but on the Day of Resurrection ye shall deny each other and ye shall curse each other, and your resort shall be the Fire, and ye shall have no helpers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And Lut believed in him. And he said: verily I am going to migrate to my Lord; verily He is the Mighty, the Wise.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We bestowed on him Is-haq and Y'aqub, and We placed among his posterity prophethood and the Book, and We vouchsafed unto him his hire in the World, and verily in the Hereafter he shall be of the righteous.

name: Daryabadi
text: And Lut: Recall what time he said unto his people: verily ye commit an indecency wherein none hath preceded you in the Worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: Ye go in indeed unto males, and ye rob on the highway, and ye commit that which is disreputable in your assembly? Then the answer of his people was naught but that they said: bring thou God's torment on us if thou art of the truth-tellers.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: my Lord! give me victory over the corrupt people.

name: Daryabadi
text: And when Our messengers came unto Ibrahim with the glad tidings, they said: verily we are about to destroy the inhabitants of that city: verily the inhabitants thereof have been wrong-doers.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: verily Lut is therein. They said: we know better who is therein: we are to deliver him and his household, save his wife; she is to be of the lingerers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And when Our messengers came unto Lut, he was distressed on their account and felt straitened on their account. And they said: fear not, nor grieve: verily we are to deliver thee and thy household, save thy wife: she is to be of the lingerers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily we are about to bring down upon the inhabitants of this city a scourge from the heaven, for they have been transgressing.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We have left thereof manifest sign for a people who reflect.

name: Daryabadi
text: And unto Madyan We sent their brother, Shu'aib. He said: my people! worship Allah, and fear the Last Day, and commit not evil on the earth as corrupters.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then they belied him; wherefore an earthquake laid hold of them, and they lay in their dwellings, crouching.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the 'Aad and Thamud and of a surety their destruction is apparent unto you from their dwellings. The Satan made fairseeming their works unto them, and so kept them off from the path, while they were endued with sight.

name: Daryabadi
text: And Qarun and Fir'awn and Haman! And assuredly Musa came unto them with the evidences, yet they were stiff-necked in the land. And they could not outstrip Us.

name: Daryabadi
text: Wherefore each We laid hold of for his sin. Of them were some on whom We sent a violent wind; and of them were some - who were overtaken by a shout; and of them were some - with whom We sank the earth; and of them were some - whom We drowned. Allah was not such as to wrong them, but themselves they were wont to wrong.

name: Daryabadi
text: The likeness of those who take other patrons than Allah is as the likeness of the spider who taketh unto herself a house. And verily the frailest of all houses is the spider's house - if they but knew!

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily Allah knoweth whatsoever thing they invoke beside Him. And He is the Mighty, the Wise.

name: Daryabadi
text: And these similtudes! We propound them for mankind; and none understand them save men of knowledge.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah hath created the heavens and the earth in truth; verily there in is a sign for the believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Recite thou that which hath been revealed unto thee of the Book and establish thou the prayer; verily prayer preventeth man from indecency and that which is disreputable: and surely the remembrance of Allah is the greatest. And Allah knoweth that which ye perform.

name: Daryabadi
text: And dispute not with the people of the Book unless in the best manner, save with those of them who do wrong; and say: we believe in that which hath been sent down unto us and that which hath been sent down unto you: our God and your God is One; and unto Him we are submissive.

name: Daryabadi
text: And likewise have We sent down unto thee the Book; so those to whom We have vouchsafed the Book believe therein, and of those also some believe therein. And none gainsay Our signs save the infidels.

name: Daryabadi
text: And thou hast not been reciting any book before it, nor hast thou been writing it With thine right hand, for then might the followers of falsehood have doubted.

name: Daryabadi
text: Aye! it in itself manifest signs in the breasts of those who have been vouchsafed knowledge, and none gainsay Our signs save the wrong-doers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they say: wherefore are not signs sent down upon him from his Lord! Say thou: signs are with Allah only, and I am but a manifest warner.

name: Daryabadi
text: Sufficeth it not for them that We have sent down unto thee the Book to be recited unto them? Verily herein is a mercy and an admonition for a people who believe.

name: Daryabadi
text: Say thou: Allah sufficeth for witness between me and you: He knoweth whatsoever is in the heavens and the earth. And they who believe in falsehood and disbelieve in Allah, those: they shall be the losers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they ask thee to hasten on the torment. And had not there been a term appointed, the torment would surely have come unto them. And surely it shall come upon them of a sudden while they perceive not.

name: Daryabadi
text: They ask thee to hasten on the torment; and verily the Hell is about to encompass the infidels.

name: Daryabadi
text: On the Day whereon the torment shall cover them from above them and from underneath their feet, and He shall say: taste that which ye have been working!

name: Daryabadi
text: My bondmen, who believe! verily My earth is wide, so Me alone worship.

name: Daryabadi
text: Every soul shall taste of death; then unto Us ye shall be returned.

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who believe and work righteous works--them We shall surely settle in lofty dwellins of the; they shall be of the Garden whereunder the rivers flow; they shall be abiders therein. Excellent is the hire of the Workers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Who persevere and in their Lord trust!

name: Daryabadi
text: And how many a moving creature there is that beareth not its provision! Allah provideth for it and for you. And He is the Hearer, the Knower.

name: Daryabadi
text: And wert thou to ask them.: who hath created the heavens and the earth and subjected the sun and the moon they would surely say: Allah. How then are they deviating?

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah expandeth provision for whomsoever He Will of His bondmen and stinteth it for him. Verily Allah is of everything the Knower.

name: Daryabadi
text: And wert thou to ask them: who sendeth down water from the heaven, and therewith quickeneth the earth after the death thereof? they would surely say: Allah. Say thou: all praise unto Allah! Aye! most of them reflect not.

name: Daryabadi
text: And this life of the world is but: sport and play. Verily the home of the Hereafter--that is life indeed, if they but knew!

name: Daryabadi
text: So When they mount upon the ships they call on Allah making pure for Him the religion, then when He delivereth them safely on the land, lo! they associate

name: Daryabadi
text: So that they become ingrate for that which We have vouchsafed unto them, and that they enjoy themselves; but presently they shall know.

name: Daryabadi
text: Behold they not that We have appointed an inviolable sanctuary, while men are being snatched away round about them? in falsehood then believe they, and unto the favour of Allah will they be ingrate?

name: Daryabadi
text: And who is a greater wrong-doer than he who fabricateth a lie against Allah or belieth the truth when it cometh unto him Will there not be in the Hell an abiding-place for the infidels?

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who strive hard in us, We shall surely guide them in Our paths; verily Allah is with the welldoers.
